sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Upgrade script to copy all values in workplace_location (type - space) to location (type - workplace_location) field</description>
        <name>Copy Space to WP location Fix script</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[copySpace2Location();
function copySpace2Location() {
	WPLogger.info('copySpace2Location', 'Starting upgrade script to copy workplace_location to location field in Reservations table');
	var resGr = new GlideRecord(WPConstants.TABLES.RESERVATION);
	resGr.addNullQuery('location');
	resGr.setWorkflow(false);
	resGr.query();
	while (resGr.next()) {
		resGr.location = resGr.workplace_location;
		resGr.update();
	}
	WPLogger.info('copySpace2Location', 'Finishing upgrade script to copy workplace_location to location field in Reservations table');
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2020-06-10 13:36:01</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>666b9ff10f151010784dd2d92f767e51</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Copy Space to WP location Fix script</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">a208b07253201010b10bddeeff7b1281</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="">a208b07253201010b10bddeeff7b1281</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_666b9ff10f151010784dd2d92f767e51</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-06-26 09:38:16</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Copy Space to WP location Fix script
